title: Kanmaniye Pesu Lyrics Kaakki Sattai (1985)
stanzas:
kannangal pudhu roja poo
un kangal iru oodhaa poo
idhu poovil pooththa
poovaiyo

andhapuram indhapuramo
vizhi maiyittu andhikalai
sollitharumo iru kai thottu.(2)

aayiram pon pokkum
en dhegam engumey
angulangidaamal
inba gangai pongumey.

tholilil en maarbilum
konjidum en anjugam
naan nee yedhu hoi hoi

kannangal pudhu roja poo
en kangal iru oodhaa poo
idhu poovil pooththa
poovaiye

unnai kodu ennai tharuven
oru thaalattil pilli Tamizh
sollitharuven vizhi moodamal.(2)

kangalaal en dhegam
engum kaayam seigiraai.
kaigalaal en paadham
neevi aara seigiraai.

vaanagam ivvaiyagam
yaavume en ...
nee thaan thanthaai ho ho

kannangal pudhu roja poo
un kangal iru oodhaa poo
idhu poovil pooththa
poovaiyo
